thread.title: Michelob Ultra Dallas 13.1 will not be rescheduled, area race producers offer alternatives
thread.title_full: Michelob Ultra Dallas 13.1 will not be rescheduled, area race producers offer alternatives | Dallas Morning News

author: Debbie Fetterman
title: Michelob Ultra Dallas 13.1 will not be rescheduled, area race producers offer alternatives
text:
Race officials with Michelob Ultra Dallas 13.1 will not reschedule Saturday's race, but other race producers have welcomed disappointed half marathoners to participate in other upcoming half marathons.
Friday's decision to cancel was made in collaboration with local officials and weather experts, who stressed that the heavy rain and expected flooding, presented potentially dangerous conditions, said Amy Henderson, a spokesperson for Life Time Fitness.
Michelob Ultra participants have the following options:
Â· The Dallas Running Club has opened 300 discounted spots to its Nov. 1 half marathon to runners ,who were registered for Saturday's half. The entry fee will be $50 rather than the current $85. Interested runners should send an e-mail _ with proof of their 13.1 registration (race confirmation or race bib photo) _ to DRCMU13.1@gmail.com . Once received, the DRC will send runners a discount code that will allow them to register for next Sunday's DRC Half Marathon.
Â· The Rock 'n' Roll Marathon Series and Dallas Marathon have invited 13.1 half marathon registrants to transfer their registration at no additional cost to one of the following Dallas-area events:
*-Dec. 6 San Antonio Rock 'n' Roll Half Marathon or 5K
*-Dec. 13 Dallas Half Marathon
*-March 20, 2016 Dallas Rock 'n' Roll Half Marathon or 5K
Â· The Michelob Ultra 13.1 Series has invited Dallas 13.1 runners transfer their registration at no additional cost to one of the following 13.1 Series events:
*-Nov. 15 Michelob Ultra Fort Lauderdale 13.1
*-March 6 Michelob Ultra Miami Beach 13.1
Click here for transfer instructions:
